item.description:
For Immediate Release: Award winning playwright presents his new comedy "The Gloucester House Boys at the West End Theater, 959 Islington Street, Portsmouth, NH.





The Gloucester House boys is George Hosker-Bouley's latest in his string of sold-out comedies. The Gloucester House is an upscale 1930's escort service run by Miss Lana, a Madame who is ready to hang up her heels and retire. In the hopes of providing continued excellent service to her clients Miss Lana is running a contest among her escorts: whoever brings in the most cash in one month's time by doing "what they do best" will win the keys to the business.

The Gloucester House Boys is a screwball adult comedy that likes to push the limits while tickling your funny bone. Miss Lana has a secret of course, and each one of her escorts: the dashing Cecil, the giddy Theodore and the presumptuous Edwin will stop at nothing to not only lear this secret but also to own the business for their very own. Each scene presents a new surprise that leads up to an ending that no one can see coming.

 

If there are 40 people who will commit to going, we'll have a PRIVATE SHOWING!

 

Admission $15. RSVP NOW so I will have an idea of the headcount for reservations.

PLEASE DO NOT RSVP UNLESS YOU INTEND TO GO!

Thank You.


This posting, and the information contained within, is not to be copied, modified, or edited in any way without the expressed written consent of the Portsmouth and Beyond Organizer.
item.how_to_find_us: PLEASE, principle RSVPs ONLY. Meetup information will be emailed prior to the event.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: "The Gloucester House Boys" By the Award winning playwright George Hosker-Bouley
